COMMENTS:
1) LIGHTLY_DAMAGED = Slight structural damage
2) SEVERE_TO_MODERATE_DAMAGE = Moderate structural damage
3) HEAVILY_DAMAGED_OR_DESTROYED = Heavy structural damage
(in the reference taxonomy)
4) Damage is estimated in terms of the replacement value of both public- and private-domain physical assets damaged or destroyed.

REFERENCE: Josip Atali_, Marija Dem_i_, Maja Bani_ek et al. The December 2020 Magnitude (Mw) 6.4 Petrinja earthquake, Croatia: Seismological aspects, emergency response and impacts, 09 November 2022, PREPRINT (Version 1) available at Research Square [https://doi.org/10.21203/rs.3.rs-2136108/v1]
